description: Ministry of City Planning and Water Supply - Order to approve the acquisition of the immovable properties - in Glen Alphinwatta Batagala Kotasa, Badulla D/S Division, Badulla District for the Construction under the Badulla - Hali Ela - Ella integrated Water Supply Scheme; in Walhaputhenna, Haldummulla D/S Division, Badulla District under the Haldummulla - Beragala Water Supply Scheme; in Batapotha, Kaduwela D/S Division, Colombo District under the Welivita Water Supply Scheme and in Badulla Central Hunukotuwa, Badulla D/S Division, Badulla District under the Badulla Urban Waste Water Disposal Project
